Definitely Tokyo, Osaka and Kyoto. Going to japan for your holiday is a safe bet because the Japanese yen has dropped fairly quickly over the last six and a half a months. In addition, it’s been dazzlingly hot there. You might just as well go for an onsen soaking up the sun ğŸŒ I went on holiday in Tokyo last year. I enjoyed going to the winter carnival near Fuji mountain ğŸ” soaking up the nice Christmassy atmosphere. I recommend climbing the Fuji mountain ğŸ” It’s an arduous journey but it’s well worth it for the view from the mountaintop and the confidence that you’ll gain afterwards. Again, it’s a fair bet that the yen will continue to fall so you might as well holiday in japan ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ over the summer.
You can even pitch camp there to get the best of the night sky ğŸŒŒ
